attributes.action: Wolfgang - Legend of Soltau for an MBE
attributes.additional_details:
Every Soldier who served in BAOR through the 70's onwards recongises the nam of Wolfgang.
Wherever you were on the training area, however covert you thought you were being, Wolfgang would find you. This man could get anywhere in his blue Mercedes van. He'd park up, ring the bell and wait for the troops to turn up for "Bratwurst mitt Pommes".
After a week of "Compo" this was a real morale booster for thousands of Soldiers over the years and should be recognised in some way if possible.
